pullRequest.title: [3.1.0] Add sample api.yaml to use as the definition for apictl init and fix minor issues
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
Fixes: #1886
Goals
Backporting #1891
Approach

Fixed minor issues in the pages Getting Started with WSO2 API Controller and Importing APIs Via Dev First Approach.
Added a sample api.yaml to be used as the definition for apictl init command.

Related PRs
#1891

commit.message: Add sample api.yaml to use as definition for init and correct minor issues

nodes.bodyText:
Shall we change the description to make it less verbose? The current descriptions are not adding much value. I feel that we can simplify this a lot, such as,
                `--environment` or `-e` : The environment the command is executed on
                `--name` or `-n` : The name of the respective API
                `--version` or `-v` : The version of the respective API
                `--action` or `-a` : The action to be taken to change the status of the API

        -   Optional :  
                `--provider` or `-r` : The provider of the respective API
